# updateTextAttributes(conversionHandler:)

**Instance Method**

Applies the current font panel settings to the selected text.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func updateTextAttributes(conversionHandler: ([NSAttributedString.Key : Any]) -> [NSAttributedString.Key : Any])
```
